name: Stepan 's Life (Beta)
description:
We have to play as a local drunk who needs to drink all the time, but on his way to booze there will be a lot of different adventures. Some adventures will be just passing from the computer to the kitchen for booze, and somewhere we have to run from the furious cleaner Gali through a hospital full of wards and various technical rooms. In general, along the way of the plot, our Drunk Stepa has to go through a lot! Yes, that's the name of our main character! So what? Are you ready to experience this power of five-day adventures? If SO, THEN DOWNLOAD THIS GAME AND PLAY TO YOUR HEALTH!

!!! attention: ALL EVENTS AND CHARACTERS IN THE GAME ARE FICTION! THE GAME DOES NOT AIM TO OFFEND, HURT OR HUMILIATE ANYONE! IT WAS CREATED ONLY FOR ENTERTAINMENT PURPOSES !!!
-Thank you for your understanding! Good luck in passing!
